description: Italy was the first country in Europe to be overwhelmed by the virus but is so far keeping it in check.
title: Coronavirus: How Italy has fought back from virus disaster
title_page: Coronavirus: How Italy has fought back from virus disaster - BBC News
maintext: Its testing rate is not exceptionally high - the UK is carrying out over three times the tests of Italy - but the swabs are widely available and rapid testing is now in place at some airports, train stations and schools, so there is no sign of the problems in accessing tests that have been seen in the UK and elsewhere.
